name: D-Link
description:
D-Link is a co-op game where you use a link between two characters to kill enemies.

It was made by 6 game design student in few days of work.

Team:

- Michel Bigourd

- Justine Duluye (https://twitter.com/Falia18_)

- Mathieu Bouchonnet (https://twitter.com/Eagleee_)

- Hubert De Buyer (https://twitter.com/MixBulfreak)

- Zoé Lemaître (https://twitter.com/zoe_lemaitre)

- Alexandre Zandecki (https://twitter.com/zoe_lemaitre)
